EmailTemplate.subject: You have new learning assigned to you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You have new learning assigned to you!
Hello,
Please click here to access your NCR myTrailhead home page. Any required learning will reflect in your Assignments section. If you do not see the Assignments section, please email us at my.Trailhead@ncr.com.
You can also access your required learning from the Salesforce home page Assigned Learning component.
Next Steps:
Take the training Earn points and badges along the way
If you have any questions about the training content, please engage the Global Sales Enablement Team at GSE@ncr.com. If you have technical issues accessing myTrailhead, contact the NCR myTrailhead Team at my.Trailhead@ncr.com.
